Sure, here is an updated action plan that starts in the spring semester and shows the amount of credits the student would be taking as they continue through college:

First Three Months (Spring Semester) - Full Load (15-18 credits)
----------------------------------------------------------------

* Research at least 10 companies in the field of interest and tailor the resume and cover letter accordingly.
* Attend at least one public speaking workshop/seminar and practice delivering speeches in front of small audiences.
* Attend at least two networking events and aim to make at least one meaningful connection at each event.
* Join a student organization and get involved in planning at least one event.

Second Three Months (Spring Semester) - Full Load (15-18 credits)
-----------------------------------------------------------------

* Apply to at least 5 internships per week in the field of interest and follow up with the ones that have been applied to.
* Attend at least one public speaking workshop/seminar and deliver a presentation in front of a small audience.
* Attend at least two networking events and aim to make at least one meaningful connection at each event.
* Take up a leadership role in the student organization and plan an event successfully.

Third Three Months (Summer) - No or Part-time Classes
-----------------------------------------------------

* Secure an internship with a major company and start working on building a professional network within the company.
* Deliver a presentation to an audience of at least 25 people with confidence and clarity.
* Attend at least two networking events and aim to make at least one meaningful connection at each event.
* Continue taking up leadership roles in the student organization and work towards planning another successful event.

Fourth Three Months (Fall Semester) - Full Load (15-18 credits)
---------------------------------------------------------------

* Continue working on the internship and gaining experience in the field of interest.
* Attend at least one public speaking workshop/seminar and deliver a presentation in front of a larger audience.
* Attend at least two networking events and aim to make at least one meaningful connection at each event.
* Collaborate with the student organization to plan a major event and lead a successful execution.

In this updated plan, the action plan starts in the spring semester and shows the amount of credits the student would be taking as they continue through college. The first and second three months are during the spring semester when the student is taking a full load of 15-18 credits. The third three months are during the summer when the student may not have any classes or only part-time classes. The fourth three months are during the fall semester when the student is taking a full load of 15-18 credits again. The plan is still broken down into four segments with specific actions to be taken in each segment, but the timeline is adjusted to fit the academic schedule and account for potential differences in workload during the summer.
